title: Multiscale Modeling of Schedule-Dependent Drug Synergy in Gastric Adenocarcinoma - Source Code
description: Source code repository for a multiscale computational framework modeling schedule-dependent drug synergy in AGS gastric adenocarcinoma cells. The framework integrates PhysiBoSS-based agent-based modeling with Boolean signaling networks to capture molecular, cellular, and tissue-scale dynamics. Includes model source code, EMEWS workflows for parameter exploration, and analysis scripts for calibration experiments, synergy sweeps, and drug timing analyses.
